name: Linux Shell Pipe to Shell
description: Detects suspicious process command line that starts with a shell that executes something and finally gets piped into another shell
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

detection.query:
selection: {"CommandLine|startswith": ["sh -c ", "bash -c "]}
selection_exec: [{"CommandLine|contains": ["| bash ", "| sh ", "|bash ", "|sh "]}, {"CommandLine|endswith": ["| bash", "| sh", "|bash", " |sh"]}]

falsepositives: Legitimate software that uses these patterns
